meta.name: description
meta.content: We, the Franklin Regional School community, strive for excellence, learning, achievement, and citizenship in all we do.

img.alt: Massaro Construction tours Sloan 4th graders through the renovation areas of the school.

img.alt: Artist and FR 1999 Alumni Christopher Ruane chats with FRMS art students as they explore his photography exhibit as the Westmoreland Museum of American Art.

img.alt: FRSH 2019 Telethon A Success!

img.alt: Classrooms for Phase I of the Primary School renovation project are completed!

img.alt: The pad for the new Intermediate School was completed in December.

img.alt: Judge Conway administers Oath of Office to the newly elected FR School Directors - Ed Mittereder, Herb Yingling, Gary English, Debra Wohlin, Bill Yant, and Scott Weinman.

figcaption.p: Judge Conway administers Oath of Office to the newly elected FR School Directors - Ed Mittereder, Herb Yingling, Gary English, Debra Wohlin, Bill Yant, and Scott Weinman.

img.alt: Two Newlonsburg Elementary School Kindergarten girls enjoy reading to a Pembroke Welsh Corgi as part of the BARK reading program.

figcaption.p: The BARK Program at Newlonsburg Elementary School!

img.alt: Sloan Elementary School teachers and FR administrators celebrate World Kindness Day by wearing their best Mister Rogers sweaters and cardigans!

figcaption.p: Sloan Elementary School teachers and FR administrators celebrate World Kindness Day by wearing their best Mister Rogers sweaters and cardigans!

img.alt: The FR Boys Soccer team celebrates becoming the 2019 Section Champs! The team is now on the way to the WPIAL championship game at Highmark Stadium on Saturday.

figcaption.p: The FR Boys Soccer team celebrates becoming the 2019 Section Champs! The team is now on the way to the WPIAL championship game at Highmark Stadium on Saturday.

figcaption.p: Boys Soccer!

figcaption.p: FRSH Homecoming King Riley Smith and Queen Kara Soles.

img.alt: PSBA honors four FR School Directors with service award certificates. Shown are Dr. Larry Borland, Dennis Pavlik, Herb Yingling, and Jane Tower.

figcaption.p: Honored by PSBA for their years of service on the Franklin Regional School Board are Dr. Lawrence Borland (8 years), Mr. Dennis Pavlik (8 years), Mr. Herb Yingling (16 years), and Mrs. Jane Tower (8 years).

img.alt: Spitzer Toyota in Monroeville Sponsors $18,000 Innovation Grant for the FR Panther Foundation.

figcaption.p: Spitzer Toyota in Monroeville presents the FR Panther Foundation with an $18,000 check for the 2019-20 Spitzer Innovation Grant to be awarded to six FR teachers.

img.alt: Franklin Regional Senior High School’s Courtney Sheridan, Captain, is shown holding FRobotics Team 4150’s winning trophy together with alliance teammates, Benjamin Marcouiller, of Team 2051 from AW Beattie Career Center and Kyle Berg, of Team 1511 from Rochester

figcaption.p: Franklin Regional Senior High School’s Courtney Sheridan, Captain, is shown holding FRobotics Team 4150’s winning trophy together with alliance teammates, Benjamin Marcouiller, of Team 2051 from AW Beattie Career Center and Kyle Berg, of Team 1511 from Rochester Robotics in New York.

img.alt: U.S. Army Major Alexander Kerr, a 2001 FRSH graduate, joins FR's proud military veterans who are currently members of the FR staff and School Board. Major Kerr was the guest speaker at FR's Opening Day assembly for that officially kicked off the 2019-20 school year for teachers and staff.

figcaption.p: U.S. Army Major Alexander Kerr, a 2001 FRSH graduate, joins FR's proud military veterans who are currently members of the FR staff and School Board. Major Kerr was the guest speaker at FR's Opening Day assembly for that officially kicked off the 2019-20 school year for teachers and staff.

div.div: We, the Franklin Regional School community, strive for excellence, learning, achievement, and citizenship in all we do.

img.alt: Report Card icon

div.div: Tonight (4.24.20), the District will be closing the eSchool Home Access Center to families in elementary and middle schools at 7:00 p.m. in preparation for report card processing. Click on the link to read an important letter for elementary families regarding report cards.

div.div: Click on the link to view information about next week's Grab n Go meals. Remember to sign up the day before your meal pick up so we have enough for everyone!

div.div: Please join us live as the 3rd episode of "FRHSTV At Home Edition" premieres at 1:00 pm on Friday, April 24, 2020.

img.alt: electronics class

figcaption.p: STREAM Education
Performing Arts
Kindergarten
Graduation
Unified Sports
Band

div.div: We are committed to excellence. Students, families, staff, administrators, and community partners work every day to make our school more vibrant, rigorous, creative, adaptable, and fun.
We are committed to learning as a multi-faceted, life-long process and the focus of everything we do. We expect everyone to develop knowledge, skills, and self-awareness.
We are committed to growth in academics. We promote, recognize, and value our accomplishments.

We act with integrity and in an ethical and responsible manner. In this way, we promote each person's ability to be a productive, contributing, thoughtful, respectful, and socially responsible citizen.

div.span: Ⓒ 2019 Franklin Regional School District. All rights reserved.
